verses.verse: Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he is good <S%H2896><s%>; For his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> now say <S%H559><s%>, That his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> now say <S%H559><s%>, That his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Let them now that fear <S%H3373><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, That his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Out of my distress <S%H4712><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> upon Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>: Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> me and set me in a large place <S%H4800><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is on my side <S%H3372><s%>; I will not fear: What can <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> do unto me <S%H6213><s%>?
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is on my side among them that help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H7200><s%>: Therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> Than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in man <S%H120><s%>.
It is better <S%H2896><s%> to take refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> Than to put confidence <S%H982><s%> in princes <S%H5081><s%>.
All nations <S%H1471><s%> compassed me about <S%H5437><s%>: In the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> I will cut them off <S%H4135><s%>.
They compassed me about <S%H5437><s%>; yea <S%H5437><s%>, they compassed me about: In the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> I will cut them off <S%H4135><s%>.

They compassed me about <S%H5437><s%> like bees <S%H1682><s%>; They are quenched <S%H1846><s%> as the fire <S%H784><s%> of thorns <S%H6975><s%>: In the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> I will cut them off <S%H4135><s%>.
Thou didst thrust <S%H1760><s%> sore <S%H1760><s%> at me that I might fall <S%H5307><s%>; But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> helped me <S%H5826><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and song <S%H2176><s%>; And he is become my salvation <S%H3444><s%>.

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of rejoicing <S%H7440><s%> and salvation <S%H3444><s%> is in the tents <S%H168><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>.
The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is exalted <S%H7426><s%>: The right hand <S%H3225><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> valiantly <S%H2428><s%>.
I shall not die <S%H4191><s%>, but live <S%H2421><s%>, And declare <S%H5608><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3050><s%> hath chastened <S%H3256><s%> me sore <S%H3256><s%>; But he hath not given me over <S%H5414><s%> unto death <S%H4194><s%>.
Open <S%H6605><s%> to me the gates <S%H8179><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: I will enter <S%H935><s%> into them <S%H3034><s%>, I will give thanks unto Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
This is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall enter into it <S%H935><s%>.
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H6030><s%>; for thou hast answered me <S%H3444><s%>, And art become my salvation.
The stone <S%H68><s%> which the builders <S%H1129><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> Is become the head <S%H7218><s%> of the corner <S%H6438><s%>.
This is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s doing <S%H6381><s%>; It is marvellous in our eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
This is the day <S%H3117><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%>; We will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> and be glad in it <S%H1523><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> now <S%H577><s%>, we beseech thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah: O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, we beseech <S%H577><s%> thee <S%H6743><s%>, send now prosperity.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be he that cometh <S%H935><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: We have blessed <S%H1288><s%> you out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is God <S%H410><s%>, and he hath given us light <S%H215><s%>: Bind <S%H631><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> with cords <S%H5688><s%>, even unto the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>.
Thou art my God <S%H410><s%>, and I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H430><s%>: Thou art my God, I will exalt thee <S%H7311><s%>.
Oh give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he is good <S%H2896><s%>; For his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
